definition: thick pole/bar/rod/thick line/to mark with a thick line/to sharpen (knife)/(old) coffin-bearing pole

sentences.english: Beth sat high on the monkey bars crying.
sentences.chinese: 她坐在高高的單槓上哭起來。

sentences.english: He invented several pieces of equipment including the parallel bars, the horizontal bar and the rings.
sentences.chinese: 他發明了一些體操器械，包括雙槓單槓和吊環。

sentences.english: One day I was playing on a horizontal bar by myself.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，我一個人在外面爬單槓。

sentences.english: This is only an exercise in composition.
sentences.chinese: 體操運動員們在單槓上練習。

sentences.english: Facilities like horizontal bar should be fixed by bracing wires because of the looseness caused in long time.
sentences.chinese: 對單槓等器材需要用拉線固定，使用時間長了會鬆動。
